content:
2 questions about GF#13123:
- the OID for ICD-10-NL is wrong... but I can't find the correct one
- the DE OCD-10 has version specific OIDs... and probably should have version specific systems.. I just asked them... what about ICD-10-NL?
@Grahame Grieve , I added the requested info to the ticket. ICD-10 has had exactly 1 OID over the years: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.3.2

In case you want to search for more stuff in the OID Registries we have: http://decor.nictiz.nl/decor/services/OIDIndex

Any OID can be exported as NamingSystem. I import the HL7 International OID Registry regularly and combine that with the FHIR NamingSystems. The HL7 OID Registry contains the leading registration data and the FHIR NamingSystems tell me if there is a URI for an OID and if that URI is preferred within FHIR (normally is).
k thanks. I didn't think of searching artdecor directly. Google didn't find it
We disabled robots at some point for the work environments because of the huge load the cumulative bots caused.
